title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. B, pt. 2524 - Evictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. B, pt. 2524 - Evictions

State Regulations
§ 2524.1 - Restrictions on removal of tenant
§ 2524.2 - Termination notices
§ 2524.3 - Proceedings for eviction-wrongful acts of tenant
§ 2524.4 - Grounds for refusal to renew lease, or in hotels, discontinuing a hotel tenancy, without order of the DHCR
§ 2524.5 - Grounds for refusal to renew lease or discontinue hotel tenancy and evict which require approval of the DHCR
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. B, pt. 2524

Statutory authority: N.Y.C. Administrative Code, §§ 26-511[b], 26-518 [a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
